item.title: On minimal degree of Summetric Boolean Polynomials
item.description: Very rough notes on the topic, mostly based on the following papers, * Gill Cohen’s MS thesis * VON ZUR GATHEN and Roche * Noam Nisan and MARIO SZEGEDY
